content: teddy hat by christina lundborg one size skill level easy materials yarn chelsea luxe teddy 100% merino 131 yards chelsea luxe suri 75% baby suri 25% mulberry silk 459 yards color way used in sample khakis needles size 8 us circular needles 16 long stitch glossary k2tog=knit 2 stitches together k1 p1 rib even number of sts round 1 rs *k1 pl repeat from* to end repeat round 1 for k1 pl rib gauge 12 sts and 34 rnds = 4 over st st with size us 8 needles check gauge for best results cast on 60 stitches place marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist work in ki pi ribbing until piece measures 5 inches from cast on edge once ribbing is finished continue in stockinette stitch knit every round until piece measures 10 inches from cast on edge shape crown weigh your yarn and you should have 12 grams remaining note change to dpn s when there are too few sts on needle round i decrease *k4 k2tog repeat from * around round 2 and all even rounds knit rounds 3 decrease k3 k2tog repeat from around round 4 knit round 5 decrease k2 k2tog repeat from around round 6 knit round 7 decrease *k2tog repeat from * around cut tail pull through remaining stitches finishing note i did not block sample as hats tend to grow with wear do not wash or agitate as this is a non super wash wool if you wish to steam please block lightly finished measurements width 10 inches length 12 inches thanks so much for downloading my pattern i hope you receive as much joy from knitting and wearing hats as i do хохохохохохо
